# Compiled object files
*.o
*.obj
*.elf

# Precompiled libraries
*.a
*.lib

# Executables and firmware binaries
*.bin
*.hex
*.eep
*.elf
*.map

# Arduino build folder (auto-generated)
build/
.arduino-build/
.arduino-build*/ 
.arduino-output/
.arduino-ci/
.tmp/
*.ino.cpp

# PlatformIO
.pio/
.pioenvs/
.pio/libdeps/
.pio/build/
.platformio/

# VS Code
.vscode/
.history/
*.code-workspace

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Icon?
*.log

# Backup / temporary files
*~
*.swp
*.swo
*.bak
*.tmp
*.orig
